name: codegen-example
description: An example demonstrating the Calimero SDK's generated client with React hooks.

scripts.regenerate:abi-conformance: cd ../abi-codegen && npm run build && mkdir -p ../codegen-example/src/generated && node dist/cli.js -i __fixtures__/abi_conformance.json -o ../codegen-example/src/generated/abi-conformance
